QuestData.Title: For Queen and Grove!
QuestData.Description:
You have already done so much to help us since you first step foot in our realm! I'm so glad you decided to join our covenant.
There will be plenty of time for reminiscing later, though. You have an audience with the Winter Queen herself to go to!
Let's not keep her waiting!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Winter Queen in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Your actions here will echo beyond the veil. Aid the forest, and all mortal worlds may yet be saved.
